name: Long-sleeved Cotton Top
desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.

name: Jeggings
desc: CONSCIOUS CHOICE Jeggings in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with soft, adjustable elastication at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.

name: Long-sleeved Cotton Top 2
desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.

name: Legging Berbulu Dalam
desc: ADJUSTABLE WAIST Celana legging dari katun jersey organik tebal dengan bagian dalam berbulu lembut. Karet lembut yang dapat disesuaikan di pinggang agar pas dan nyaman di perut.

name: Cotton Flannel Shirt
desc: Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

name: Denim Dungarees
desc: CONSCIOUS CHOICE Dungarees in washed denim. Adjustable straps with press-studs at the front, a press-stud at the sides and fake fly. Chest pocket, fake diagonal front pockets and real back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and along the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).

name: 2-piece Set
desc: Comfortable set with a shirt in a cotton weave and a pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, a rounded hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

name: Lined Jeans
desc: LINED Jersey-lined jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.

name: 2-pack Lined Joggers
desc: LINED Casual-style joggers in cotton twill with a soft jersey lining. Easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly and fake side pockets.

name: Sleep Bag
desc: Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only. Tog 2.0.

name: 3-pack T-shirts
desc: T-shirts in supersoft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 2-4Y).

name: 2-potong Set
desc: ADJUSTABLE WAIST Setelan kaus dari katun jersey lembut dan celana jogger dari denim pudar berbahan campuran katun. Kaus dengan bahu turun dan kancing tekan di satu bahu (kecuali ukuran 2-4th). Jogger dengan karet pinggang yang dapat disesuaikan dan saku depan imitasi.
